question.title: Bluetooth Issue in Android trying to pair Wiimote *(rooted device)
question.body:
https://github.com/timawesomeness/PairWiimote/ I need your help regarding fixing this app to make it work on A-13. Can you make it work? It does make the wiimote pair, but the error comes up "read failed, socket might closed or timeout, read ret: -1" on Xlogger "same device a-10 it works like a controller and get paired too"

Same device, custom aosp ROM Android -10, works fine gets paired and syncs(one light starts) When ROM upgraded to a-13, it does pair in this app but it doesn't work (all lights blink infinitely) "read failed, socket might closed or timeout, read ret: -1" on Xlogger it says

I recently started working upon this. I really dont know much of coding but yes I can update my code a bit as I run on Android Studio and managed to make this app compile for sdk 34.

Any help to make wiimote pair is appreciated!

tried to update but didnt worked
